languages.text: Воодушевляющая речь Лорд-капитана, транслировавшаяся через {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-систему, не произвела должного впечатления на затронутый позорным разложением экипаж. После проведения выборочной децимации формирование команд для ремонта первичных систем было завершено в срок.

traits.locale_text: Воодушевляющая речь Лорда-Капитана, транслировавшаяся через вокс-систему, не произвела должного впечатления на затронутый позорным разложением экипаж. После проведения выборочной децимации формирование команд для ремонта первичных систем было завершено в срок.

languages.text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.
languages.original_text: Воодушевляющая речь Лорд-капитана, транслировавшаяся через {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-систему, не произвела должного впечатления на затронутый позорным разложением экипаж. После проведения выборочной децимации формирование команд для ремонта первичных систем было завершено в срок.

traits.locale_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the vox system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the vox system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the vox system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

languages.text: La arenga de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, emitida por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, no tuvo el efecto deseado en la tripulación afectada por la corrupción. Tras diezmar a la tripulación, los supervivientes pronto formaron equipos para reparar los sistemas principales.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

traits.locale_text: La arenga de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, emitida por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, no tuvo el efecto deseado en la tripulación afectada por la corrupción. Tras diezmar a la tripulación, los supervivientes pronto formaron equipos para reparar los sistemas principales.

languages.text: 领主舰长通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出了振奋人心的讲话，但却未能对饱受腐化所困的船员们产生预期的效果。在领主舰长执行了十一抽杀之后，剩下的船员迅速集结成小组，开始修复各个主要系统。
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出了振奋人心的讲话，但却未能对饱受腐化所困的船员们产生预期的效果。在领主舰长执行了十一抽杀之后，剩下的船员迅速集结成小组，开始修复各个主要系统。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムで放送されたロード・キャプテンの高揚させる演説は、腐敗に苦しむクルーには期待するような効果が見られなかった。クルー10人につき1人を処刑してから、残ったクルーで主要システムの修復チームを速やかに結成した。
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムで放送されたロード・キャプテンの高揚させる演説は、腐敗に苦しむクルーには期待するような効果が見られなかった。クルー10人につき1人を処刑してから、残ったクルーで主要システムの修復チームを速やかに結成した。

languages.text: Die aufrüttelnde Rede des Lord Captains, die über das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-System ausgestrahlt wurde, hatte nicht die gewünschte Wirkung auf die von Verderbnis geplagte Besatzung. Nachdem jedes zehnte Besatzungsmitglied hingerichtet worden war, bildeten die Verbliebenen umgehend Teams, um die Primärsysteme zu reparieren.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

languages.text: Le vibrant discours {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, diffusé sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g}, n'a pas eu l'effet escompté sur l'équipage rongé par la corruption. Après l'exécution d'un membre d'équipage sur dix, les survivants sont rapidement rentrés dans les rangs pour réparer les circuits principaux.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

traits.locale_text: Le vibrant discours {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, diffusé sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g}, n'a pas eu l'effet escompté sur l'équipage rongé par la corruption. Après l'exécution d'un membre d'équipage sur dix, les survivants sont rapidement rentrés dans les rangs pour réparer les circuits principaux.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminden yayınlanan yüreklendirici konuşması, yozlaşmaya tutulmuş mürettebatta arzulanan etkiyi yaratamadı. Her on tayfadan birinin idam edilmesinin ardından kalanlar hızlıca ekiplere ayrılarak ana sistemlerin onarımına başladı.
languages.original_text: The rousing speech from the Lord Captain, which was broadcast over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, failed to have the desired effect on the corruption-afflicted crew. After the execution of every tenth crew member, those who remained promptly formed teams to repair the primary systems.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminden yayınlanan cesaret verici konuşması, yozlaşma bulaşmış tayfalarda arzulanan etkiyi yaratamadı. Her on tayfadan birinin idam edilmesinin ardından kalanlar hızlıca ekiplere ayrılarak birincil sistemleri onarmaya başladı.
